the twenty-first Ruling Steward of Gondo: South}}</ref> aged 120 years)was the twenty-first Ruling Steward of [[Gondor]]. He succeeded his father [[Beregond (Steward of Gondor)

{{disambig-two: Belecthor was the last of his line to pass the age of 100.  Upon his death [[White Tree of Gondor]] also died, but was left standing "until the King comes".<ref>{{PM
Belecthor was followed by his son [[Thorondir]] at his death in 2872.<ref name="South"/>

Belecthor's date of death was recorded in [[Appendix A]] and "[[The Heirs of Elendil]]" as [[Third Age 2872]], but in [[Appendix B]] as [[Third Age 2852]]. Since the [[The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition)
the twenty-first Ruling Steward of Gondo: 50th Anniversary Edition]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' this has been corrected so all dates now show [[Third Age 2872]].<ref name="RC">[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]], ''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion]]'', "Appendix A", p. 715</ref>
